Class: MarginMeasurer

insight. MarginMeasurer

new insight.MarginMeasurer()

utils/MarginMeasurer.js, line 3
Calculates margins for Charts, given axes and series with datasets.

Methods

#self.calculateChartMargins(seriesArray, measuringCanvas, axisStyles, labelStyles){object}

utils/MarginMeasurer.js, line 131
Calculates a margin object {top,left,bottom,right} for a chart given a list of series and associated CSS styles
Name Type Description
seriesArray insight.Series[] An array of Series to calculate dimensions from
measuringCanvas DOMElement A canvas element to measure text with
axisStyles object An associative map {cssName: value} of styles to apply when measuring axis values (font-size, font-family etc.)
labelStyles object An associative map {cssName: value} of styles to apply when measuring axis labels(font-size, font-family etc.)
Returns:
margin object {top: Number,left: Number,bottom:Number,right:Number}

#self.seriesLabelDimensions(series, lineHeight, axisContext, labelContext, labelStyles){object}

utils/MarginMeasurer.js, line 29
Calculates the dimensions required for a single series' margin entries
Name Type Description
series insight.Series A Series to measure
lineHeight Number The CSS line-height to use when defining dimensions
axisContext object A 2d canvas drawing context to measure axis value text with
labelContext object A 2d canvas drawing context to measure label text with
labelStyles object An associative map {cssName: value} of styles to apply when measuring axis labels(font-size, font-family etc.)
Returns:
margin object {top: Number,left: Number,bottom:Number,right:Number}
